member.shortcv: Mr. ANTHONY PAPARGYRIS is a candidate Ph.D. researcher in the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business. Since 2001, he is working as a researcher in the Electronic Trading Research Unit (ELTRUN). His research interests include practices for communicating and capitalising knowledge within Computer-Mediated Communities of Practice, Knowledge Management and Learning.
